text: Katrin Sjögren (born 2 February 1966) is a Finnish politician from the Åland Islands. She has been the Premier of Åland since 25 November 2015. She has also been the leader of the Liberals for Åland party since 2012. She became a member of the Parliament of Åland in 2003. She was Minister of Social Affairs and Environment between 2007 and 2011. She lives in Mariehamn, the capital city of the Åland Islands. She is married to Anders Eriksson. The couple have three children. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Åland Islands Category:Finnish politicians Category:Government ministers
title: Katrin Sjögren
